commit message:
Merge branch 'master' into tablet

Fixed issue with extra fragment showing when editing a bookmerk (via long press) from tag screen.
Read menu option in view bookmark screen on phones now works correctly.
Improved manual syncing.
Use compatibility library for invalidating options menu.
Fixed issue with search suggestions not viewing.

Fixed some FC's on read view errors.
Fixed switch layouts in ics phones.

Changed action bar style.
Fixed tag overflow on phone.
Added some alt text.
Fix tablet detection and menu button on ICS phones.
Move bookmark view options to submenu.
Fixed add bookmark scrolling.
Switched to json format for viewtext.
Fix tablet detect.
Add xhdpi drawable folder.
Update icons, optimize action bar for ICS phones.
Reworked some action bar options and added ShareActionProvider.
Fix tablet menus, cleanup.
Fix add bookmark screen, more menu cleanup.
Switch from deprecated urlencoder.
Read view tweaks.
Fix menus for 2.x.
Fix some configuration change bugs.
Fixed configuration change issue.
Add bookmark tweaks.
Add some xhdpi icons.
Get web page title from share intent, if available.  Tested in stock Sense 4.0 browser (present) and Chrome 18 (not present).
Fix configuration changes on tablets not reloading the current bookmark being viewed.
Fix config changes in bookmark feed view.
Add bookmark menu item in view bookmark feed.
Fixed wrapped tags cutting off bookmark count in tag list.
Change to fancy switches in ICS preferences screen.
Fix tag view for tablet.
Change some fonts.
Use smaller version of Roboto.
Move view items to submenu for older devices.
Move shareactionprovider out of split action bar due to platform bug causing action bar to take full height of screen.

Updated support lib.

Set version number.
